response: "data privacy is a fundamental right, yet it's constantly under threat. 🤖👀 did you know that many apps and websites collect your personal data without your consent? 😱 from browsing history to location tracking, our private information is being exploited for profit. 💰 it's time we take control of our digital lives and demand better data protection laws! 🚀👍 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #digitalrights"
